entries.wrong_state: You cannot complete that action while in your current state.
entries.wrong_item_type: %TT can only accept items of type %TO.
entries.unable_to_insure: [Insurance] The item you selected is either uninsurable or already insured.
entries.unable_to_destroy: The object %TT is a special item and cannot be destroyed.
entries.too_much_shock: There are too many shock wounds for the medicine to do any good.
entries.too_many_pets: You have too many active pets.  Store one before you tame again.
entries.tip_target_bad: The target isn't valid for a /tip operation.
entries.targetting_error: You have no target to do that.
entries.target_self_disallowed: You cannot target yourself with this command.
entries.target_out_of_range: Your target is out of range for this action.
entries.target_offline: Your request cannot be processed because the specified target is offline.
entries.target_not_player: The selected action cannot be performed because your target is not a player.
entries.target_not_incapacitated: You cannot perform the death blow. Your target is not incapacitated.
entries.target_not_droid: The selected action cannot be performed because your target is not a droid.
entries.target_not_creature: The selected action cannot be performed because your target is not a creature.
entries.target_must_be_player: Your target must be a player for the requested command.
entries.target_full_medicine: You target is already on the verge of toxic blood level. Any more would kill them.
entries.target_full_food: Your target is already stuffed and cannot eat anymore!
entries.target_full_drink: Your target cannot drink another drop!
entries.target_already_dead: But your target is already dead!
entries.sys_repair_unrepairable: %TT's condition is beyond repair even for your skills.
entries.sys_repair_slight: You have repaired the item, however the item's maximum condition has been reduced.
entries.sys_repair_perfect: You have repaired the item with only minor blemishes.
entries.sys_repair_imperfect: You have only marginally repaired the item.  The item's max condition has been reduced.
entries.sys_repair_failed: You have completely failed to repair the item.  The item falls apart.
entries.sys_nothing_repair: You don't have anything in need of repair (make sure your weapons are unequiped).
entries.sys_eject_success: You have been moved to the nearest building's ejection point.
entries.sys_eject_fail_proximity: The eject attempt failed because there isn't a building nearby.
entries.sys_eject_fail_move: The ejection attempt failed because you moved.
entries.sys_eject_fail_ground: The ejection attempt failed because you were already on the ground.
entries.sys_eject_fail_contained: The ejection attempt failed because you are inside a building.
entries.syntax_unconsent: syntax: /unconsent <player name> {optionally, use commas to seperate several player names}
entries.survey_swimming: You cannot perform that action while swimming.
entries.survey_standing: You must be standing to take a survey or samples.
entries.survey_sitting: You can't use the survey tool while sitting.
entries.survey_on_mount: You cannot perform that action while mounted on a creature or driving a vehicle.
entries.survey_mind: You are exhausted.  You need to clear your head before you can survey again.
entries.survey_in_structure: You cannot perform survey-related actions inside a structure.
entries.survey_error: Unable to find the specified resource type.  Please survey again.
entries.survey_cant: You can't use the survey tool at the moment.
entries.string_too_long: The shout string must contain fewer than 64 characters.
entries.stomach_unknown: Something just tried to query a stomach that does not exist. Please contact a GM.
entries.set_tool_first: Tool range not set. Please select the desired range and select USE again.
entries.sample_mind: You need to rest before you can take any more samples.
entries.respawn_jedi_failed: An error occured trying to spawn at the Force Shrine location.  Attempting to spawn at nearest cloning facility.
entries.respawn_current_location: Due to an internal error, you will respawn at your current location...
entries.respawn_closest_facility: Due to an internal error, you will respawn at the closest cloning facility.
entries.remove_only_corpse: You cannot place items into a corpse.
entries.remove_only: You cannot place items in this container.
entries.rare_harvest_on_corpse: A rare harvest resource has been left on %TT.
entries.race_restriction: That food isn't edible by your species.
entries.prose_pay_nsf: You have insufficient funds to pay %DI credits to %TT.
entries.prose_pay_fail: Your attempt to pay %DI credits to %TT has failed.
entries.prose_pay_acct_fail: Your attempt to pay %DI credits to %TO has failed.
entries.prose_over_max_entries: List truncated. Display request over %DI entry maximum.
entries.prose_open_fail: You cannot open that container [%TT] right now.
entries.prose_nsf_skill_plural: [%TT] You lack the skill to use these items.
entries.prose_nsf_skill_cmd: You lack sufficient skill to use the %TO command.
entries.prose_nsf_skill: [%TT] You lack the skill to use this item.
entries.prose_nsf_insure: You have insufficient funds to insure your %TT.
entries.prose_insure_fail: An attempt to insure your %TT has failed. Most likely, this is due to lack of funds.
entries.prose_incomplete_loot: You were unable to loot %DI item(s) from %TT.
entries.prose_hit_xp_limit: You have achieved your limit of %DIpts for experience type '%TO'.
entries.prose_harvest_dna_failed: You are unable to sample DNA from the %TT right now.
entries.prose_harvest_corpse_failed: You cannot extract resources from %TT in your current state.
entries.prose_coin_loot_fail: You failed to loot %DI credits from %TT. Please contact a CS representative for assistance.
entries.pets_only: That food is only suitable for pets.
entries.pet_died_other: The pet was too weak and didn't survive the revitalization treatment.
entries.pet_died_master: Your pet was too weak and didn't survive the revitalization treatment.
entries.perm_no_open: You do not have permission to open this container.
entries.perm_no_move: You do not have permission to move this object.
entries.nsf_to_split: There are insufficient group funds to split
entries.nsf_clone1: You lack the 1 additional credit required to cover the cost of cloning.
entries.nsf_clone: You lack the %DI additional credits required to cover the cost of cloning.
entries.not_in_guild: You are not in a guild.
entries.not_grouped: You cannot perform this command because you are not grouped.
entries.not_group_leader: Only the group leader may perform the requested action.
entries.not_all_insurable: Not all of the selected items are insurable.
entries.no_uninsured_insurables: You do not possess any items that can be insured at this time.
entries.no_resource: You cannot harvest that from the creature.
entries.no_pet_feed: You may only feed your pet special food once per hour.  (Or you can store and call your pet to feed it again.)
entries.no_corpse_permission: You do not have permission to access this corpse.
entries.no_cloning_facilities: There are no registered cloning facilities for the planet.
entries.mandalorian_armor_restriction: You must be a Master Bounty Hunter, a Master Ranger, a Master Commando, or a Master Squad Leader to equip this item.
entries.insure_ui_error: An error has occurred in the insurance UI. Please contact a GM.
entries.insufficient_skill: You lack the skill to use this item.
entries.insufficient_permissions: You do not have sufficient permissions to perform the requested action.
entries.insufficient_funds_cash: You lack the cash funds to complete this transaction request.
entries.insufficient_funds_bank: You lack the bank funds to complete this transaction request.
entries.harvested_on_corpse: One or more resource containers were left on %TT.
entries.harvest_dna_failed: What creature would you like to sample DNA from?
entries.harvest_corpse_failed: What corpse would you like to extract resources from?
entries.group_loot_fail: There has been an error looting the coins from a corpse. Please try again.
entries.goggle_submenu: Please select a sub-option to set the color of your goggles.
entries.full_medicine: You blood is already quite diluted with medicines. Any more would be toxic.
entries.full_food: You are too full to eat that.
entries.full_drink: You are too full to drink that.
entries.error_invite_range: You invite target is beyond the maximum group invite range.
entries.equipped_goggles: You may only alter the color of your goggles when they are unequipped.
entries.droid_repair_you_in_combat: You cannot repair this droid while you are in combat!
entries.droid_repair_target_not_droid: Your target is not able to be repaired with these tools.
entries.droid_repair_opposite_faction: It would be unwise to repair a droid such as this.
entries.droid_repair_not_valid_location: You must be in a city, at a camp site, or near your residence in order to use these tools.
entries.droid_repair_not_droid_engineer: You must be a droid engineer to use this tool kit.
entries.droid_repair_no_wounds: It appears %TO has no wounds to repair.
entries.droid_repair_no_wound_kit: No valid droid wound repair kit was found in your inventory.
entries.droid_repair_no_target: You must target a droid pet to use these tools.
entries.droid_repair_no_damage_kit: No valid droid damage repair kit was found in your inventory.
entries.droid_repair_no_damage: It appears %TO has no damage to repair.
entries.droid_repair_must_wait: You cannot repair a droid for another %DI seconds.
entries.droid_repair_droid_in_combat: You cannot repair this droid while it is in combat!
entries.destroy_goggle: A pair of SE Goggles was detroyed because it was in an invalid container or you are not flagged to own SE Goggles.
entries.create_goggle_non_se: You can only use this command if you have the Special Edition version of Star Wars: Galaxies.
entries.create_goggle_fail: One or more of your SE Goggles were unable to be created.  Your inventory may be full.
entries.corpse_empty: You find nothing else of value on the selected corpse.
entries.corpse_drag_range: You are too far from the selected corpse to drag it.
entries.corpse_drag_into: You cannot drag a corpse into a structure.
entries.corpse_drag_inside: You cannot drag a corpse within a building. Go outside to have your corpse ejected.
entries.consent_to_empty: You have not granted consent to anyone.
entries.consent_from_empty: No one has granted you their consent.
entries.cmd_no_effect_on_target: That command had no effect on your target.
entries.cmd_bad_target: You cannot use this command on your current target.
entries.clone_fail: An attempt to clone you has failed.
entries.cash_transfer: There has been an error during an attempt to transfer funds from your on-hand cash. Verify you have sufficient funds for the desired transaction.
entries.cannot_target: You cannot target this person with the requested action.
entries.cannot_loot_all: You were unable to loot everything on the corpse.
entries.bulk_insure_errors_prompt: The following items were unable to be insured:
entries.bank_withdraw: There has been an error during an attempt to withdraw funds from your bank account. Verify you have sufficient funds for the desired transaction.
entries.bank_transfer: There has been an error during an attempt to transfer funds from your bank account. Verify you have sufficient funds for the desired transaction.
entries.bank_null_transaction: Your banking transaction request must be for an amount greater than zero.
entries.bank_menu_open: Your transaction request has been denied because you have a bank menu open.
entries.bank_error: An unknown error occurred during your banking transaction. Please contact a GM.
entries.bank_deposit: There has been an error during an attempt to deposit funds to your bank account. Verify you have sufficient funds for the desired transaction.
entries.bad_insure_request: Unable to process insure item request.
entries.bad_clone_location: You must be inside a cloning facility to perform this command.
entries.add_only: You cannot remove items from this container.
